1278420.name: BLOCKLORDS
1278420.description:
What is BLOCKLORDS?

BLOCKLORDS is a player-driven MMO medieval grand strategy game where your decisions and skills shape the world and narrative.

Choose from several playstyles, including farming, fighting, resource management, and ruling, and forge your own destiny as your Hero.

Experience the pinnacle of strategy gaming with BLOCKLORDS and let your legacy be written in the annals of its world. Join us, as this medieval saga beckons you to make your mark.



The Battlefield:

Prepare for epic warfare! The battlefield has evolved with the introduction of dedicated maps tailored for large-scale real-time combat, where hundreds of units clash in live confrontations.

Command squads gain new battlefield actions to swing the outcome in your favor.



The Art of Agriculture:

Farm resources and settle farms across an expansive world map, customizing them to your vision. In this ever-changing world, start a family and watch as your stats and traits evolve with each strategic decision, shaping the future of your lineage. As you navigate the challenges of pioneering life, embark on grand adventures, meet personalities, confront fearsome creatures, and unravel enigmatic adventures. Deploy specialized squads for tasks such as resource gathering and enemy confrontations, furthering your legacy as a strategic leader.



The Thrill of Combat:

Defend your territories or embark on a journey of conquest. As you traverse this challenging landscape, rise steadily from the simple life of a farmer to the power and prestige of a Ruler. Along your path, face treacherous beasts hidden within the forests and stave off aggressive raiders. At every crossroad, decide whether to stand as a loyal knight, upholding honor, or embrace the unpredictability of a wild raider.



The Responsibility of Ruling:

Oversee vast regions, implementing decisions on levies and spearheading the development of flourishing cities. Claim regions, harvest taxes, and shape your city's fate. Hire knights to defend your territories and remain vigilant over factors like population, order, and prosperity which will dictate the gameplay experience, all while becoming an influential leader.

The Quest for Conquest:

Dictate the destinies of entire kingdoms with a blend of power and strategy at your helm. As you claim the crown, take steps to cement a legacy that stands the test of time, with the command of mighty armies at your fingertips, venture forth to expand your dominions.
1278420.supported_languages:
英语*, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 简体中文, 法语, 意大利语, 日语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 俄语, 韩语, 土耳其语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
